alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 11:39PM MDT until June 24 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Tripp County in south central South Dakota... Eastern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1238 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Dallas to 7 miles northwest of Dog Ear Lake to 4 miles northwest of Littleburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Winner and Ideal South Housing around 1255 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central South Dakota. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
